comments.content:
I know it's not an exact match, but Luxury Gold from House Industries has a similar feel. I'll let you know if I come across the real thing.

[http://www.houseind.com/fonts/luxuryfonts](http://web.archive.org/web/20140718235149/http:/www.houseind.com/fonts/luxuryfonts "http://www.houseind.com/fonts/luxuryfonts")

Idlewild is also close-ish, but no cigar.

[http://www.typography.com/fonts/font\_overview.php?productLineID=100043](http://web.archive.org/web/20140718235149/http:/www.typography.com/fonts/font_overview.php?productLineID=100043 "http://www.typography.com/fonts/font\_overview.php?productLineID=100043")
[Montag](http://web.archive.org/web/20140718235149/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/insigne/montag) comes closer to me, if not mtaching.
You're right. Montag is a perfect match. Well done.
